name: Anti-Scratch Bike Chain
desc: SLC bike chain offers uncompromising quality. Compatible with SRAM, Shimano, and other derailleur systems in the market. Special treatment on chain plate evenly brings up a performance on anti-scratch, easy maintenance, multi-colors available.
